mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID as productId, PC_ID as pcId, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE as PRICE, PRODUCT_INFO as info, PRODUCT_IMG as img, PRODUCT_SALES as sales, PRODUCT_STOCK as stock, PRODUCT_DATE, PRODUCT_CONTENTS, SHIPPINGFEE as shippingFee FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
